summary: A well-off grocery store owner and his outspoken right hand, who are head over heels in love with their neighbours, are about to have their ambitious plans crushed when the girls' true sweethearts put in an appearance at a joyous event.
cast: Kostas Hatzihristos|Nikos Rizos|Kostas Doukas|Marika Nezer|Nikos Fermas|Dina Trianti|Thanasis Mylonas|Nelly Pappa|Yiorgos Olimbios|Giorgos Velentzas|Kostas Mendis|V. Kormou|Ivonni Vladimirou|Kaiti Finou|Hristos Vamvakas
title: Tis kakomoiras
